article.title: U.S. Army Awards Extension to Lockheed Martin for Battle Command System
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Lockheed Martin has received a $36 million extension on a contract to develop portions of the U.S. Army's Battle Command System for project manager Battle Command, located at Fort Monmouth, New Jersey. Lockheed Martin will continue working on design, development, integration, test, training and field service support.
